Method Detail

calculateBarometricPressure

public double calculateBarometricPressure()
Calculate the Barometric Pressure. This will calculate the Barometric Pressure (by default) in in Hg. The defualt pressure is not necissarily the presure returned: which is based on the state of the pressure messurement (the units). The Pressure by default is calculated in in. Hg. But, are converted to the appropriate units (mm in Hg or millibars) as needed based on the units set.

calculateBarometricPressure_in

public double calculateBarometricPressure_in()
Calculate the default barometric pressure (in. Hg)

calculateBarometricPressure_mm

public double calculateBarometricPressure_mm()
Calculate the Barometric Pressure in mm Hg This is done by calculating the Pressure by default (in in. Hg) and then CONVERTING it to mm

calculateBarometricPressure_mb

public double calculateBarometricPressure_mb()
Calculate the Barometric Pressure in millbars This is done by calculating the Pressure by default (in in. Hg) and then CONVERTING to millibars

getPressure

public double getPressure()
Return the barometric pressure measured in the default units (in. Hg).

getPressure_mm

public double getPressure_mm()
Return the barometric pressure measured in mm Hg. This is done by grabbing the default pressure (which is in in Hg) and converting it to millimeters by multiplying it by 25.4. If there is an error (an exception of some kind), the default pressure value will be returned. This is a way of letting the system or user know there is something wrong with the barometer

getPressure_mb

public double getPressure_mb()
Return the barometric pressure measured in millibars. This is done by grabbing the default pressure (which is in in Hg) and converting it to millibars by multiplying it by 33.864

getCalibratedSlope

public double getCalibratedSlope()
Return the calibrated slope (gain) for the current barometric calibration (this is subject to change)

getCalibratedOffset

public double getCalibratedOffset()
Return the calibrated offest (intercept) for the current barometric calibration (this is subject to change)

getInputVoltage

public double getInputVoltage()
Return the Input Voltage (vdd). This is previously calculated.

getOffsetVoltage

public double getOffsetVoltage()
Return the voltage needing to be set when calibrating the barometer.

getOutputVoltage

public double getOutputVoltage()
Return the Output Voltage (vad). This is previously calculated.

getUnits

public int getUnits()
Return the current units (in. Hg, mm Hg, millibars)

              throws UnitsException
